docs.text: ReLeLA The REpresentation LEarning and Natural LAnguage Processing (ReLeLa) research group located within the Department of Computer Science (DCC) at the University of Chile focuses on the intersection of representation learning and natural language processing. Members Academic Staff Jorge Pérez Felipe Bravo-Marquez Students Constanza Fierro Juan Andrés Moreno Víctor Caro Pablo Badilla Juglar Díaz Sebastián Donoso Frank Zamora Jhonny Cerezo Vicente Oyanedel José Cañete Collaborators Jocelyn Durstan
